name: Smartwool Non-Binding Pressure Free Palm Crew Socks - Women's
categories: Non-Binding Pressure Free Palm Crew Socks
description: Life’s too short to wear boring socks. Step it up a notch – these ones have merino to naturally regulate temperature and let your feet breathe. The non-binding cuffs add comfort under boots or skinny pants.Merino, nylon and spandex wicks sweat and manages temperature to keep you cool in the summer yet warm in the winter.Non-binding cuff won't indent or constrict your calves.Virtually Seamless™ toe eliminates chafing and hot spots.Arch brace hugs the foot for a snug and supportive fit.Women's-specific fit.
